snippet: The Olympic 200-meter gold medalist Allyson Felix and the Olympic decathlon winner Ashton Eaton are the 2012 Jesse Owens Award winners.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic 200-meter gold medalist Allyson Felix and the Olympic decathlon winner Ashton Eaton are the 2012 Jesse Owens Award winners.

headline.seo: Allyson Felix and Ashton Eaton Named Top Track and Field Athletes
headline.main: Felix and Eaton Named Top Track and Field Athletes
